subject: Remove automatic sample image loading, add placeholder for empty image cells
body:
- Remove auto-loading of sample images on app startup
- Add visual placeholder (checkered pattern + icon) for empty image cells
- Remove unused loadSampleImage function from useAdState
- Sample images still available via Media tab for manual addition

https://claude.ai/code/session_01QwGfCraNcGELMsxj6hUpbB
title: Remove automatic sample image loading, add placeholder for empty image cells
